Grapevine.Gaylord Texan Resort Hotel & Convention:
Gaylord Texan Resort & Convention Center is a hotel and convention center, opened in Grapevine, Texas minutes from Dallas - Fort Worth, on April 4, 2004. It has 400,000 sq ft (37,000 m2) of meeting space and 1,511 guest rooms.
Gaylord Texan is owned by Ryman Hospitality Properties (formerly known as Gaylord Entertainment Company), and operated by Marriott International.
